parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

responseCode.description: The user input to accept/reject the override.

contextName.description: The name that is displayed for the context

chargeName.description: The name that is displayed for the charge

chargeAmount.description: Holds the charge amount equivalent in charge account currency

chargeCurrency.description: Holds the currency code of the charge account from where the fee is deducted

chargeAccountId.description: The identifier of the charge account

chargeAccountCurrencyId.description: The identifier of the currency fo the charge account

debitAccountId.description: The identifier of the debit account

creditAccountId.description: The identifier of the credit account

beneficiaryIBAN.description: The IBAN of the beneficiary's account

creditorAgentBIC.description: The BIC code used by an agent in a payment transaction

accountWithBankBIC.description: BIC of Account with Bank being the bank where the beneficiary maintains his account.

accountWithBankIBAN.description: IBAN of Account with Bank being the bank where the beneficiary maintains his account.

accountWithBankClearingCode.description: Clearing code or sort code of the account with bank being the bank where the beneficiary maintains his account.

creditorAgentCountryId.description: The identifier of the country of the creditor agent

paymentCurrency.description: Holds the list of currencies for which the payment order will be accepted for the country and payment order with any currencies other than one defined will not be allowed.When left undefined then payment order will be open for all currencies

instructionIdReference.description: The reference used in SEPA payments to indicate the type of payment

endToEndReference.description: This field is used for SEPA

chargeBearer.description: Bearer of the charges of the order

PSDCompliant.description: Defines whether the transaction is PSD (Payment Services Directive) compliant

simulatedAt.description: The last time simulation activity was run

creditValueDate.description: The value date applied to the credit side of a payment

ultimateDebtor.description: The ultimate debtor of the payment

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

parse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

paymentProduct.description: Valid record in PAYMENT.ORDER.PRODUCT which allows Payment through Beneficiary i.e. PAY.THROUGH.BENEFICIARY set as YES.Product for which the Beneficiary will be preferably used in Payment order.Will get defaulted in PAYMENT.ORDER.PRODUCT field of Payment order if not defined

ultimateDebtor.description: The ultimate debtor of the payment

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

parse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

code.description: The identifier of the error message
